explains: n. 能力，能够；才能，技能，本领
wordGroup: practical ability 实践能力；实际能力
writing ability 写作能力；书写能力
working ability 工作能力，加工能力
physical ability 体能，体质能力；身体能力
ability to pay 支付能力
executive ability 执行力；行政能力
administrative ability 行政能力；经营才能

sentences.en: Her drama teacher spotted her ability.
sentences.cn: 她的戏剧老师发现了她的才能。

sentences.en: Almost everyone has some musical ability.
sentences.cn: 几乎人人都有一些音乐才能。
